titleStmt.title: (Copy of) report to the basilikosgrammateus concerning temple documents that have been sent

msContents.summary: The presbyter of the priests notifies to theauthorities (to the basilikos grammateus, Hermophilus) that the letter with a register of priests and a temple inventory concerning the year in question has been sent.

msItem.note: 11 lines; cursive script along the fibres
Related to P. Fouad 186-189 (ed. A. Bataille, Un nouveau dieu Ä Bacchias, –tudes de papyrologie, 4, 1938, p. 197-205)

origin.origPlace: Bakchias, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome,province of Egypt

provenance.p: Purchased in Berlin by Lund University Library in 1933, from prof. Carl Schmidt; Isabella Andorlini "Scavi e acquisti di papiri negli anni '30: il caso dei PLund" in Comunicazioni, Firenze 1995, Istituto papirologico G. Vitelli, p. 45-50

div.ab: To Hermophilus, basilikos grammateus ofthe meris of Herakleides in the Arsinoite nome, from Peteuris ... presbyter of the priests of Boubastis of the village Bakchias. I have handed in to you a list of priests and a temple inventory ... for the current year which is the 28th of our lord Aurelius Commodus Antoninus Caesar Felix Augustus.; (2nd hand:) Through Hermophilus, on the fifth supplementary day of Mesore.

listBibl.bibl: P.Bacch. 10 SB VI 9333 P.Lund. IV 5 BL III, 105 (line 11); BL V, 64f.; BL VI, 74 (line 8); BL VIII, 343 (lines 10, 11); TM 14151; Hombert, M., Chronique d'–gypt 14, 1939, p. 400-401; Gilliam, E. H., Yale Classical Studies 10, 1947, p. 181 ff; American Journal of Philology 70, 1949, p. 218 - 221
